703280f-a.title: Brooklyn: Bradford Street - Atlantic Avenue
703280f-a.text:
Byadford Street, (formerly Butler Street), west side, south of Atlantic
Ave., showing the Turn Hall, a frame structure 57 1/2' x 60', erected at a
cost of/ 4,00O. It was formally opened on July 4, 1864. The small house
next to the Hall was a school in 1873, but was subsequently converted into a
court house.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collectuon.
